title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\ResourcePolicySnapshotSchedulePolicySnapshotProperties
name: ResourcePolicySnapshotSchedulePolicySnapshotProperties
description:
Specified snapshot properties for scheduled snapshots created by this policy.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.ResourcePolicySnapshotSchedulePolicySnapshotProperties

params.description: Chain name that the snapshot is created in.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Labels to apply to scheduled snapshots. These can be later modified by the setLabels method. Label values may be empty.

params.name: data.storage_locations
params.description: Cloud Storage bucket storage location of the auto snapshot (regional or multi-regional).
